posts.post_content:
Posted By: Ben Y.
This card is a rare version "Stolen Sweets",with
kids in sugar barrel.There are some small scotch tape
pieces on back of card,holding fold area together,plus
back of card has 2 tiny pieces of scotch tape approx.
1" by 1/32 ".One goes through C in Central and the
other between Over The on bottom.
Best Offer, scans available.
